## Normalizer.normalizeLiteral() method

Normalizes the supplied literal value

**Signature:**

```typescript

```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  from | T | The literal value to be normalized. |

**Returns:**

[Result](./ts-utils.result.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;
